document.full_text: intercontinentalexchange inc and nasdaq omx have no reason to boost their takeover bid for the new york stock exchange parent company because their joint offer is already superior, ice's chief executive said on tuesday.
document.title: no reason to boost bid for nyse: ice ceo
lines_and_colors: intercontinentalexchange inc and nasdaq omx have no reason to boost their takeover bid for the new york stock exchange parent company because their joint offer is already superior, ice's chief executive said on tuesday.
